title: British Hats (GB)
desc:
Change the police and fire hats and also remove hats from medic and doctor. This mod will only effect UK (GB) towns/cities and may not function correctly if installed with other mods that also change UK (GB) hats.

Fire hats are custom assets while police hats are modified from 112 Operator assets.

-- Mod by Soharic. Visit www.soharicmedia.com/112/hat-mods#canadian-hats for more information.
